name: Dreamscape: Among the Sheep
description:
Jerry is trapped inside his own head while he sleeps. With the help of his sheep friend, Jerry must travel through his deep subconscious to escape the nightmare, save his dreams, and find out how to wake himself up.

  • A – move left
  • D – move right
  • W – jump
  • Hold Shift Key – roll sheep to the right
  • Tap Shift Key – throw sheep to the right
  • (Please note that after you throw or roll the sheep, it will no longer follow the player)
  • Control Key – call sheep back to you. (sheep will horizontally roll back to the players position and then continue to follow the player)
  • P – pause/unpause
